nodes.text: A Trial-born member of the Mitth family completed the Trials during the lifetime of Patriarch Mitth'oor'akiord. During the Trials, the Trial-born crossed a three-meter-wide channel of water by stacking a number of wooden planks in the water. In a conversation with Mitth'ali'astov, Mitth'oor'akiord admitted that the Trial-born's solution was valid, but that he preferred Thalias' solution, which was much more elegant.
